alert.note: Alert for Henry Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 12 at 10:27AM MDT until June 13 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT MONDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 494 BELOW 7500 FEET... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 494 Henry Mountains. * WINDS...Southwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph, strongest Monday afternoon and evening. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 4 percent with marginal overnight recovery of 20 to 30 percent. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions will occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
